name: Line Guesser
description:
A simple party game for 2 to 16 players!

Create a room and share the code with friends so they can join!

Once everyone is in, start the game! One player will become the artist!

The artist can pick one of four words, or shuffle for more, but be quick! There isn't much time before the game chooses a word for you.

Now start drawing! You can only draw straight lines, but you can clear the canvas anytime.

If you're not the artist guess your heart out! But just fyi, everyone can see your guesses. And it'll be super obvious if you get close to the answer!

Once a player has guessed the word, or time has ran out, you'll go back to the lobby where more players can join or you can start a new game!

An iOS and Android version are in progress and should be released soon.

The ability to add custom word lists and round timers is also in the works!

There isn't great feedback for when you lose connection to the server or when you have an error, but that stuff is on the way too!
